title: Fulham v Crystal Palace: Premier League – live
summary: Crystal Palace looks to maintain their impressive performance as they face Fulham at Craven Cottage. Rob Smyth will provide insights on the match-up. Fans are eager to see if Palace can extend their winning streak.

title: Referrals ‘black hole’ means patients in England miss out on healthcare, finds watchdog
summary: A Healthwatch study revealed that 14% of cases referred by GPs for treatment are not being added to hospital waiting lists. This raises concerns over potential gaps in patient care and treatment accessibility. The findings highlight the need for improved communication and processes within healthcare systems.

title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: The English top flight's goalscoring charts are showcasing the top performers of the season. Various standout players are currently at the forefront, competing for the prestigious title. Fans are eager to see who will finish as the leading scorer this season.

title: Tough baptism for Wilfried Nancy as Hearts land title blow on Celtic
summary: Celtic's new manager, Wilfried Nancy, suffered a defeat in his debut match, losing 2-1 to Hearts, who are competing for the title. The loss marks a challenging start for Nancy as he takes on the managerial role. Fans will be looking for improvement in upcoming games.

title: Ravens v Steelers, Jaguars v Colts and Bills v Bengals: NFL week 14 – live
summary: Graham Searles will provide live updates on tonight's NFL games. Key matchups include the Ravens facing the Steelers at M&T Bank Stadium. Fans can tune in for real-time action and insights.
